description.raw:
Upgrade to SDF 1.4. Partial integration of pull request #205.

I had to make a new mesh for the gate and a tiled grass plane to prevent the multi-sense camera from dropping to a low frame rate. 

To see all the changes, you'll need the following pull-requests:
https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/496/allow-uri-to-be-used-when-specifying/diff
https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/493/terrain-improvements
https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/34/use-normal-maps-properly-updated-starting/diff


**Gate**

Made a collada mesh, and added a new text

**Grass Plane**

Created a set of tile for the grass. Grass plane has lower coefficients of friction.

**Gate Numbers**

Increased their visibility

**vrc_task_1.world**

Smoothed out the terrain. Made high friction collisions for the road.

**vrc_task_3.world**

Only a partial update to this world. Switch from using a `grass_plane` to a `pavement_plane`.

I had to make a new mesh for the gate and a tiled grass plane to prevent the multi-sense camera from dropping to a low frame rate.

To see all the changes, you'll need the following pull-requests: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/496/allow-uri-to-be-used-when-specifying/diff https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/493/terrain-improvements https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/pull-request/34/use-normal-maps-properly-updated-starting/diff

Gate

Made a collada mesh, and added a new text

Grass Plane

Created a set of tile for the grass. Grass plane has lower coefficients of friction.

Gate Numbers

Increased their visibility

vrc_task_1.world

Smoothed out the terrain. Made high friction collisions for the road.

vrc_task_3.world

Only a partial update to this world. Switch from using a grass_plane to a pavement_plane.
